outputs.output_descr:
The PBQP was created in 1998, In 2000, its scope was broadened to "Habitat", incorporating an integrated vision of urban environment and its sub-systems (housing, infrastructure and sanitation). The Program is also one of the instruments of the Federal Government to meet of the commitments made by Brazil in the Charter of Istanbul (Habitat II Conference-1996).
The H-PBQP target population is the construction industry (the construction industry and all the chains that provide inputs for this sector). At the end of the chain are consumers, public or private, generally represented by purchasing power. In this sense, are considered as beneficiaries of the whole population, particularly urban habitants.

project_descr: Programa Brasileiro da Qualidade e Produtividade do Habitat - PBQP - H
project_title: BRA00043 Program for Quality and Productivity of Habitat
